children.text: Click on the code to copy
Copy the code above, paste in the menu Promotions of the Uber app and earn at least one free trip. It's serious! :D But it will only work if you didn't already had a trip with Uber yet.
I already have an Uber account
I don't have an Uber account
The steps below must be done in the Uber app. The pictures are just a tutorial.
1. Click the blue button on the top of this app to copy the promotional code.
If you don't have the Uber app installed, download it here, open it and log in your Uber account.
5. Click in ADD CODE and paste the code copied in step 1.

content-desc: 5. Click in ADD CODE and paste the code copied in step 1.

children.text: Done! You have redeemed your discount. Now you can have at least one free trip. Isn't it amazing? \õ/
Did it work? Then share the news with your friends here.
Hey, if it isn't asking too much, could you rate our app here? Thanks! :D
The steps below must be done in the Uber app. The pictures are just a tutorial.
1. Click the blue button on the top of this app to copy the promotional code.
2. Click the link bellow (it will take you to the Uber site).
4. The code should appear at the end of the registration, but if it didn't, just paste the code copied on Step 1.
